name: Magma Mephit
description: A small, impish creature made of molten rock and fire, often found near volcanoes and lava flows.
memorable: The Magma Mephit explodes in a burst of fiery lava upon death, causing harm to nearby creatures.
goals: Causes destruction and chaos, delights in igniting objects and summoning allies.
relations: Often encountered with other mephits or elemental creatures; may serve powerful elemental beings.
environment: Volcanic regions, near lava flows, or areas of intense heat.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison, capable of causing explosive damage upon death.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, relatively low hit points.
attacks: Uses claws for melee slashing damage and can exhale fire in a cone, dealing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pyroclastic Burst unleashes an explosive blast of lava in a cone, pushing back and damaging foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in low light and darkness.
skills: Skilled in stealth, making it adept at ambushing unsuspecting enemies.
additional_information: False Appearance ability lets it camouflage as a mound of magma.
Elemental Nature allows survival in hostile environments without air or sustenance.
Can cast Heat Metal once per day, affecting creatures wearing metal.
Death Burst ability deals area damage upon its demise.
Can create magical displays to incapacitate foes.
spellcasting: Can cast Heat Metal once per day with Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
test_queries: fire elemental that blends into magma
small creature with fiery breath attack
